Text:
how i burn this file to play in psx?

como eu gravo esse arquivo para jogar no psx?

jardelmandel: You need to burn it as a bootable image disc. You can use UltraISO for this. To be able to play it on a PSX console, you'll need to have a modchip installed on your console. Or, you can just play it with an emulator.
19.5MB for a psx game? seems too good to be true..
I dont think this is legit.. To smal file...

Ripped games are just the games with videos or audio removed to reduce the file size. They can get even smaller.
 Unpacked this file is it's nearly 600 mb.

Works like a charm, missed this game so much since my PS1 broke down and no1 to fix it =[[[ its cool unpacks into 500 MB bin file, open that in emulator u got sort out the commands in options(guess) and start ownin :)) hpy hunting
how can i place it on cd???

The torrent is ok!
It works if you mount the file with PS1 Emulator (PERFECT)   you can google it its downloadable.

But there are a few bugs in the game:
1.Several misssions are missing
2.There is no music and audio from rocket lock
3.There is no mission choose option when u pass the game
No audio, I run these ISO's on my PC all the time with no problems, this one lags like a sumbitch. I'm looking for a better version...
